story: Blah blah this is why I want this article.
url: The URL to the page that this block message is about, which can also appear in the bibjson metadata link fields below

location.other: you could put other location data in here, using whichever keys suit you, they will be treated as strings. Location data fields are optional, provide whichever ones you can

email: this is a list of any author emails that could be found on the page

metadata.title: Provide any article metadata that can be retrieved from the page in here, following okfnlabs.org/bibjson convention - but NOTE metadata is OPTIONAL

journal.name: Some journal name - and other useful journal data in keys here. Used in DOAJ too

identifier.type: doi (or whatever sort of identifier it is)
